name: Lovebird, Submerged
description:
a short platformer about a gay bird who wants to not drown. extremely demo

PLEASE NOTE that a bug discovered minutes before submission prevents proper respawning; if you die, you will have to close and reopen your game. sorry for the inconvenience!!!

Writing: nastymasc. http://nastymasc.itch.io
Pixels: quailsprout. http://quailsprout.itch.io
Programming: fulgadrum. http://fulgadrum.itch.io
Music: ruune. www.ruune.net
